sentences.sentence: He is developing jet-blackly what shines hair And mouth is fond of laughing !
sentences.translation: 他长着乌黑发亮的头发和一张爱笑的嘴巴！

sentences.sentence: He produced 11 blackly comic novels, the last of them (" Five Deadly Words ") this April.
sentences.translation: 他创作了11部黑色幽默小说，最后一部(《五个致命单词》)在今年四月出炉。
